title: Brad Katsuyama, Co-Founder Of IEX
teaser: Host Jessica Harris talks with Brad Katsuyama, co-founder of IEX. Harris also talks with Jon Oringer, founder of Shutterstock.
contentencoded:
Host Jessica Harris talks with Brad Katsuyama, co-founder of IEX. Harris also talks with Jon Oringer, founder of Shutterstock
